description: I keep trying this app in the hopes it's glaring deficiency will be corrected. This incarnation of the normally excellent Sabnzbd+ will only allow one to save to /var/snap/sabnzbd/. You cannot specify a location outside that file tree. That area is controlled by root, and you can't manipulate the files there with the GUI. I'm not a super savvy Ubuntu user, and don't know how to change it, so, I'm stuck using windows for usenet, since the windows version will still allow one to specify where the downloaded files are stored. I really like this program's previous versions, and hope they update it to correct this, but I consider it unusable in Ubuntu in its present form.
only tried one nzb and it worked right off the bat. seems stable
After previously installing and setting up sabnzbd+ manually this was a nice change. It installed no problem and I have had no issues with it. Recommended.
Flawless performance, reliable and easy to use.
summary: THE best nzb downloader out there

description: Ihr braucht einen Usenet Zugang.Programm im Store updaten.
